1. To challenge the "Descent Battle", you need to
[c][DF1FB2FF]take commissions from [Events][-][/c].

2. Only one challenge is allowed for each difficulty level each day.
[c][DF1FB2FF]You won't be able to challenge it if you give up the commission[-][/c].

You can challenge it once again if you lose!
So don't give up and keep trying!
Male Student
